question.text:
Match the followings and choose the correct option.
 
  Group A   Group B
( A ) Pericarp (i) Without fertilization
( B ) Parthenocarpic fruit (ii) Ovary wall
( C ) Ovule (iii) Nutrition
( D ) Endosperm (iv) Seed

options.text: <math><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>–</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>–</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>–</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>–</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>)</mo></math>

<math><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>–</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>–</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>–</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>–</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo></math>

<math><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>–</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>–</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>–</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>–</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo></math>

<math><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>–</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>–</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>–</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>–</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo></math>

solution.text: After feritilisation ovary develops to form fruit and ovary wall develops to form fruit wall known as pericarp. Parthenocarpic fruits are formed without fertilization thus are seedless in nature. After fertilistaion ovule develops to form seed. Endosperm is the product of double fertilization and provides nutrition to developing embryo.
